message: I tried a lot to learn regex and regular expressions and i failed ... any one know a good article about Regex?

data.message: Everybody uses regular-expressions.info to get started quickly, I tried to learn it several times in the past when it becomes the last resort to solve a problem, but after a couple of weeks I completely forget it, I hate it. If you want to learn it for screen scraping and similar stuff I highly recommend trying HTML Parsers first
